Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qBigTkBLU6g&list=PLblh5JKOoLUK0FLuzwntyYI10UQFUhsY9&ab_channel=StatQuestwithJoshStarmer

1/ Probability is not Likelihood.

https://youtu.be/pYxNSUDSFH4

Probability là diện tích dưới đường cong

Likelihood là giá trị của trục tung = likelihood of observing the data

2/ Maximum Likelihood, clearly explained!!!

https://youtu.be/XepXtl9YKwc

Maximum likelihood estimate for the mean (the mean of the distribution not the mean of data), in normal distribution thì hai cái này như nhau.

Maximum likelihood estimate for the standard deviation

3/ Maximum Likelihood for the Exponential Distribution, Clearly Explained!!!

https://youtu.be/p3T-_LMrvBc

Exponential distribution is a model for the time between events.

Ex: How long will you wait before you get another text message?

Cách tính lamda và đạo hàm để tìm. Dể hiểu.
